item.title: Use the browser to spell check your website
item.description: If you maintain a website, you will surely know how important it is to never have any spelling errors in your copy. And if you really care you will always run for sure a spell checker on all your text, but isn't that quite over work? Wouldn't it be much simpler if your browser did all the spell checking without you having to worry about anything? Spell check Drag this button to the bookmarks bar and you'll have it.
